text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo 720s 81CR0006US 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo 720s 81CR0006US 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The Lenovo 720s 81CR0006US 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
